original_title: オレの言うことなんでも聞く従順なタダパコ姪
overview: Itsuki is a lonely man who has been single all his life. The only comfort in his existence is his very obedient niece Sakura Moko, who does everything he wants without thinking twice.
title: Submissive Fuck Teen Moko Sakura Listens to Everything I Say
